bill.title: Commends Representative Blake Miguez on receiving The Daily Iberian's Top 20 Under 40 recognition
bill.description: Commends Representative Blake Miguez on receiving The Daily Iberian's Top 20 Under 40 recognition

history.action: Read by title, rules suspended, adopted.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Taken by the Clerk of the House and presented to the Secretary of State in accordance with the Rules of the House.
